thread.title: Old Point National Bank names new president and CEO
thread.title_full: Old Point National Bank names new president and CEO &middot Industries | Virginia Business

author: virginiabusiness.com
title: Old Point National Bank names new president and CEO
text:
Print this page
The board of directors of Hampton-based Old Point National Bank has named Robert F. Shuford Jr. its president and CEO.
Shuford, who has served as the bankâ€™s senior executive vice president and chief operating officer, succeeds Louis G. Morris, who will retire at the end of this year.
A subsidiary of Old Point Financial Corp., Old Point National Bank has branches throughout Hampton Roads.
Old Point had assets of $893.5 million at the end of the second quarter. It recorded a profit of $2.5 million during the quarter.
